name: FEARPHANT (Prototype)
description:
Everybody knows that Elephants fears Bees! Avoid traps e collect Peanut Coins to buy some upgrades after each run.

Controls

  1. WASD
  2. ZQSD
  3. Arrow Keys

How it works

Each run has a duration of 20 seconds, when the times up you can buy some upgrades with the collected Peanut Coins.

Available Contents

  • 1 playable character;
  • 1 enemy type;
  • 1 trap type;
  • 1 power up type;
  • No sprite animations.

Future Contents

If this prototype go well, I wish to implement and create new contents to improve the experience.

  • New elephant types;
  • New enemies types;
  • New traps;
  • New power ups;
  • A better upgrade system;
  • New upgrades;
  • Animations;
  • And more...
